channel.title: How do I fix the ::vote command to make it show my vote site?
channel.description:
HI,
I tried editing the ::vote command but im not sure if im in the right place. any help would be great! thanks you :)

item.title: How do I fix the ::vote command to make it show my vote site?
item.dc:creator: @Smallboy Smallboy
item.description:
@Smallboy wrote:

[quote=“escalation, post:5, topic:406663”]thats not true, this is the correct section. The vote command is usually client sided. That is why if you try to use Rs-Ps.O*g and you use a hybrid pvp loader, if you type ::vote it’ll send you to the hybrid pvp page. That’s because it is client sided.

Example

if(inputString.equals("::vote") || inputString.equals("::Vote") || inputString.equals("::VOTE")) launchURL("VOTELINK");

Location: Your Client > Client.java[/quote]
He didnt even say his using hybird pvp loader -.-
His refering to COMMANDS look what he post

Read full topic
item.source: How do I fix the ::vote command to make it show my vote site?

item.title: How do I fix the ::vote command to make it show my vote site?
item.dc:creator: @escalation escalation
item.description:
@escalation wrote:

thats not true, this is the correct section. The vote command is usually client sided. That is why if you try to use Rs-Ps.O*g and you use a hybrid pvp loader, if you type ::vote it’ll send you to the hybrid pvp page. That’s because it is client sided.

Example

if(inputString.equals("::vote") || inputString.equals("::Vote") || inputString.equals("::VOTE")) launchURL("VOTELINK");

Location: Your Client > Client.java

Read full topic

item.title: How do I fix the ::vote command to make it show my vote site?

@Smallboy wrote:

[quote=“snowman90897, post:3, topic:406663”]yeah but where do i put this? what place on server files…
sorry! im just really lost![/quote]
put in commands.java
Source>src>server>model>player>packets>commands.java

item.title: How do I fix the ::vote command to make it show my vote site?
item.dc:creator: @Smallboy Smallboy
item.description:
@Smallboy wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("vote")) { c.getPA().sendFrame126("Put your vote URL here (Remember to remove the http) just www.<your vote Url>.com", 12000); }
Your in the wrong section lol
should be in server help , but nvm .
Hope this help !

Read full topic
